TopicTitle: A Merged Craft will Change the Original Workspace Name and Craft Name Replacing it with its Own.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None


Video Evidence:
https://youtu.be/3WO_b-uKVp0 (17 Seconds)

Steps to Replicate:

  1. Use Campaign MergedCraftStealsOriginal Attached below
  2. Go to VAB
  3. Load Top Stage
  4. Merge Bottom Stage

Result:

  • Now Top Stage (Workspace Name and Craft File Name) have been renamed to Bottom Stage
  • Also when the game autosaves it will now autosave as Bottom Stage if all I did was from the video and nothing else.

Campaign Folder:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/uf4n0qqns7g5vt7/MergedCraftStealsOriginal.zip?dl=0

How this Should Work in My Opinion:

  • The Bottom Stage is being added to the Top Stage so it should be added to the Top Stage Workspace/craft File.
  • In KSP1 the first craft loaded maintains the craft name.
Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
